attributes.action: Schools should focus on skills of students rather than academics only
attributes.additional_details: After the new GCSE have became harder some students think they will not succeed, for some it even leads to anxiety or depression. Not every student is gifted in maths, science or English but every student has a potential to change something in our world. So make schools show students that the best grades are not the only key to success
attributes.background: Schools only challenge students academically and children are told that without good grades they will not succeed in life which needs to change. Every child has a potential, every child has something special, so let’s focus on that rather than academics only.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
